scripts.pngquant: rm -rf dist/assets/images && cp -r src/images dist/assets/ && find dist/assets/images -name '**.png' -exec pngquant --strip --ext=.png --force {} \;
scripts.pngquant-flat: rm -f dist/assets/*.png && cp src/images/*.png dist/assets/ && find dist/assets -name '*.png' -exec pngquant --strip --ext=.png --force {} \;
